Blog.post: You'll never know What you've done for me What your faith in me Has done for my soul... You'll never know The gift you've given me.. I'll carry it with me (yeah...yeah...) Through the days ahead I think of days before You made me hope for something better (yes you did) And made me reach for something more You taught me to run You taught me to fly Helped me to free the me inside Help me hear the music of my heart Help me hear the music of my heart You've opened my eyes You've opened the door To something I've never known before And your love... (love) Is the music of my heart.. (music of my heart) You were the one Always on my side (always on my side) Always standing by (always standing by) Seeing me through You were the song that always made me sing I'm singing this for you (singing this for you baby) Everywhere I go I think of where I've been (think of where I've been) And of the one who knew me better Than anyone ever will again You taught me to run You taught me to fly Helped me to free the me inside Help me hear the music of my heart Help me hear the music of my heart You've opened my eyes You've opened the door (you opened the door) To something I've never known before... And your love...(your love) Is the music of my heart What you taught me Only your love could ever teach me You got through when no one could reach me Ohh...ohh...ohh Cause you always saw in me All the best that I could be It was you who set me free... You taught me to run You taught me to fly Helped me to free the me inside (me inside) Help me hear the music of my heart Help me hear the music of my heart You taught me to run You taught me to fly Helped me to free the me inside (me inside) Help me hear the music of my heart (music of my heart) Help me hear the music of my heart You've opened my eyes You've opened the door (opened the door) To something I've never known before (never, never, felt before) And your love... Is the music of my heart.. Music of my heart Music of my heart Is the music of my heart...

i only write what this heart feels to say i only write with authenticity i only use another ink on another piece of paper i only want to dance with all my words and freedom now i want you to put love on this if you can feel it please acknowledge yourself i want you to dance along with me if you can feel me please hold this really big

they just don't realize how much they hurt betray forget neglect they don't realize not to be blamed breathe... just breathe, just live and die in not knowing why if no one wake them up how can they realize? (june 9, 2004)
moonlight breaks the clouds away it's a sign of hope even when the darkness remains sunshine then breaks in it is your future where the darkness gets left behind (jan 6, 2004)

your life has been surrounded by light because God has created the sun and eyes to see it body to feel it heart to absorb it light is there so you can enjoy beauty light is there even in the dark see... --jan 14, 2004--

everything is wrong all things turn upside down fall on a piece of red paper words written in dark grey on a piece of black paper scrambled letters try to form a phrase deep meaning in confusion but everyone seems fine live in a wrong place like when we're surrounded with forrest we'll never miss the deep blue sea cos we forget everything from original line-ups to what colors match each other all get used to what is wrong turn upside down along with the upsided world (dec 24, 2003)

you've always been here even before your beginning then you will always be here until the end but, where are you now? this heart has been longing for your touch down here I close my eyes smile when I pray as I talk to you asking you to love me telling tou I love you too begging you to light my life immediately, my child (dec 17, 2004 - to my beloved one waiting for the little one)

Paint the world with different languages on top of it different accents color the air with different signs on top of it different expressions hear with positive mind see with open heart cos we are humans unique and lovely like flowers let us bloom create a wonderful garden

Why some people say that world is dark? The sun is there but it cannot brighten up the day Many people say I’ve been living all my life in the dark But everyday I can feel the sun so bright Some hate the cries of little babies Music is always too loud for their hectic days To me, every sound is beautiful like the beat of my own heart Though everybody thinks I live in silence I’ve never felt empty deep inside For every moment I cherish with songs Don’t stop singing because you think you’re not able Keep on singing for you still have your heart

When things turn upside down Not certain of what's bright or dark I close my eyes let neglect take over control Where do I stand? When nothing seems right Get me on my nerves day and night This is not my mistakes let anger take over control Where do I stand? This mountain seems too high to climb What if I fail before reaching to the top? Way too risky let fear take over control Where do I stand? When I feel powerless to make a change Things just get wilder out there Rather than face the truth, I let denial take over control Where do I stand? When things don't turn out the way I plan Should I let disappointment take control for the rest of my life? Where do I stand?

The little Goldie swims alone Does she ever feel lonely? In a bowl not even her real home Does she ever long for where she's supposed to be? Many creatures walk alone on this earth Does anyone ever feel like accompanying? Approaching and not making them feel abandoned Just for a single touch packed with a smile Why is there somebody envy the little birdie? Flying around in peace but what if she's escaping? Passing the day singing but what if she's crying? Leaving her mother and siblings where's the loving? undisguise the blessings when one search where thankyou's are Regret no separation for it has its own lessons Be thankful for the memories grown Look not to the dark side but to the bright one Be thankful for life now gets richer Spend some times alone but don't feel lonely Be thankful for friendship she used to share Search no where loneliness end Be thankful for friendship will knock again Cos blessings always last

Dedication Giving and Expecting Nothing in Return What about honesty? Can you say no when your heart tells you so? When you love your father and mother When you care about your sisters and brothers Do you give all of your heart and soul? Do you give all of your heart and soul? To your friends and neighbors To your teachers, colleagues, and people all over the world You’ve heard about gifts and money Wanting and expecting Not to mention hypocrisy Why you smile then stab people in the back? Does sincerity truly exist? Do you love your God only when He makes your dreams come true? Yet you’re longing for a true love True love does not come from outside, It is inside Sacred and pure love does exist When will you start believing? That it is there somewhere inside of you

who are you when you are alone? no light, no wind no eyes watching no ears listening no one caring when you are alone, who are you? you breathe you close your eyes but not fall asleep there is no word but you speak to who? for what? no beat but you keep on dancing no music but you keep on singing there is no road for you go nowhere there is no obligation for you follow nobody there is nothing for you need nothing there is nobody for you love nobody that heart and soul are there within who is to feel your love? from top to toe, who are you? who are you when you are alone (august 27, 2002)
Forget who you are where you come from Forget all those barriers those thick walls around you cos when you dance you dance

It used to be so dark in here there was a light but it didn't fall on me Been trying to find a way out but the road in front of me was once just a dead-end I thought I was in joy I knew I was in fear been calling out Your name but, Lord, I thought You just didn't hear In silence I begged You to take me out of this place but something kept dragging me back I knew I had stood too far from You so I couldn't hear Your answers It used to be so devastating but I knew I had enough strength to break the wall even when these eyes can't see, I can still feel the light cos now I have a soul that shines

See in the dark with my heart White candles surrounding Take a deep breath release all pain No past or future just this moment Who were you? What are you gonna be? Who takes control out of your life? Who are you gonna owe once you're free? You and I, We be Walk down alone the dark alley How am I supposed to know what's waiting in front of me? Seek some guard from the One Who'll surely wrap me with warmth Sit in the dark White candles surrounding Live this moment We be

Water the hope so it will grow When it grows big and tall and strong The world will know Don't mind the color let it show Are you brave enough to reveal your future? Or...you'd rather Find out how dreams destroyed even before you wake up Cry before sorrow knocks at your door Let go all the good things for nothing Water the hope so it will grow When it grows big and tall and strong It will protect you From colorless soul inside of you

when we are waiting are we really waiting? are we standing still... waiting? are we wondering when we are going to stop waiting? perhaps we are wasting our time perhaps practicing our swears or wandering around with our restless minds we can start a conversation with ourselves try to solve some problems we can knowledge ourselves more while waiting are we really waiting when we are waiting? october 17, 2002

Many eyes see the world's lies When people say right people do wrong Many hearts feel confused Too many words hide their real meanings When people show smiles people betray Many hands left untouched I choose to see the truth When I feel love I feel God It will soothe my soul Knowing that it's true The more we open our hearts The more we see the truth When I feel warmth I feel God I feel the light and it's true My body is a reflection of my soul The truth is beyond time It's when you wake up and fall asleep Like a prayer or a song The presence blossoms inside your soul Your love will grow deeper The truth revealed once again

the day has come again for my own life must i decide will future be another day or moments of dream to realize everytime the day comes i thank god i still can feel the warmth of sun best friend's shoulders to lean on prove that love won't leave me behind sweet surprises from the sweetest people mean to complete my happiness list they don't have to cost a fortune a sincere smile i wouldn't mind cos i've got myself the most expensive present given the day i wake up the best prayers to god from a woman i call mom --to my mom who never stops praying for all of us--

no worries about life, my dear for the morning comes and promises you a brand new day forgive yourself and the sun will forget all the past you can throw it all away or let your wisdom reminisce no worries about life, my dear for everyone makes mistakes and goes on with his life someday you'll smile the past away you see your life once tumbled down you see it was never that bad wake up in the morning for the sun and bird and tree give you lessons of life they all dedicate true love to people who appreciate can you give warmth all day and ask nothing? can you sing the clouds away and ask nothing? can you be a shelter through rain and storm and ask nothing? wake up in the morning or hide inside your cave, lonely, thirsty blame no one but you if only you can see the love inside each creation you'll have no worries about life, my dear

what's the lesson when you grow up in some unloving family? passing it on to your next generation won't make you feel better what's the lesson when you grow up witnessing lies? covering yourself up with more lies won't make you feel better it's up to them to abuse love and the truth now what's your choice? what's the lesson when words hurt the feeling? making words your best weapon won't make your world any better what's the lesson when beauty betrays your tender heart? blaming all the good things in life only turns your heart into stone it's up to them to abuse right and tenderness now what's your choice?

Everybody can do anything special one do special thing you can dance just like that or gracefully do all that Reach any star you can reach if you jump just like that reach the brightest star you can reach if you jump with your heart Born to choose your own destiny in a heavenly garden, are you just another flower? or the most beautiful one? Divine soul, just be another one or a good one? (dedicated to a very special dancer and teacher of mine: The Good One!) (Sep 17, 2002)

no one can stop you from singing it's time for you to choose any kind of genre, tempo, and style this is your stage of life pick one theme and sing with your heart see the road in front of you traces everywhere nothing's the same when people want you to follow and others tell you where to go what next that you gotta do? those trees will go where the wind blows but they will stick to the ground when it gets tough when all those candles have already blown away would you stop making a wish?

he's a soul collector his tempting smile will make you surrender leave you empty and soulless while dancing round and round restless disappointment breaks the faith down the warmest wind can't beat the coldest skin feel like searching for someone to count on could it be a man whose spirit made out of sweet lies he's a soul collector his tempting smile will make you surrender leave you empty and soulless while dancing round and round restless

It’s how you smile when you give How they see love in your eyes Whatever it is in your hands Means the sun To people missing the light The river To people missing the water Whatever it is you give You give them the world

We wouldn't be able to love others Before we could love ourselves God has long forgiven us Now it's time for us to forgive ourselves I remember someone sayin, He's not a nice person to me So I don't waste my time When he doesn't see the flower bloom inside of me He doesn't deserve me or my time God bless us with love Send us a divine soul full of love We love our sistah and her love God bless us with love Send us a divine soul full of love We love our sistah and her love cos I love God and One Love What's wrong with freedom anyway? We're all free souls do whatever we do When there's a will there's a way the Crazy Mutha Funky say that too Days, months, years, pass by More life's lessons learned Joy and pain only make us richer Our sistah today shines brighter dedicated with our deepest love to Rosie Gaines

if i saw you in heaven would you still be my sister? would you greet me in front of the door with open arms and sweet smile? would you tell me how much you've been missing me too? cos I've been getting down on my knees praying for the day to come I've been wondering what it would be like no one can make this dream come true but when i got to come to your place would it still come untrue? be a good girl just want to be a good girl so God will smile down on me and decide that I deserve a place up there want to see you just want to see you eventually look into your eyes eyes of my soul light

When the right thing is not right When your heart answers The answers you refuse to hear When life turns into riddle When faith is put on a test To survive you should pass Questions Too many questions Only one answer Won’t come out Too many values A girl in a society Fulfill too many expectations Wrong becomes right Nod Faith is put on a test When right becomes wrong How strong will you struggle? Will you fail your lovely soul? For things you don’t feel right.

I am a rainbow I make the world so colorful I choose to chase the rain away I am a lot of hopes rising up again I am a sun I give warmth unconditionally When I smile people feel the joy I brighten up each day I am a flower I dance the tears away to the breeze I am an eternal inner-beauty I am the reason for love and peace I am a star I will never leave anybody alone in the dark I pray for the dreams to come true I am a prove of God's love (and God is One Love who puts together rainbow, sun, flower and star in me)

You're so pure and so divine In a world colored with empty smile Caress them with your tender heart Put on some lights with your eyes You were born to give others warmth Everything about you is soothing A deep river in every mind A moon that shines in every night Too many lies Too many disappointments Turn your soul light down So close your eyes and see with your heart Because you're so pure and so divine Born to give others warmth

(april 3, 2003) Pretty That pretty, young girl sings on the street Not everybody cares to give her some money Everybody does realize that she is… Pretty That pretty, young girl stands on a place Where no pretty young girls should It’s not her voice that attracts the street wolves It’s her beauty, innocence, her body Pretty, young girl, What do you get from living on the street? Day by day, How much do you have to sacrifice? Pretty, young girl pretty much degraded Yet she worth pretty much more than that She’s been dreaming of a hand to take her out of the street Where she day by day sings

in this life you have hope love that blooms on a sailing boat an open door when others are shut and a star to point out it's where you trust your dreams shine down on you on thick and thin a star that knows you will win from the very moment that you begin bright future is rising from afar keep the soul from fading away always let your soul lead your way raise your hand and point out a star

How many times a day you nod Then your heart says not When all you listen to is your pride Don't care what is wrong or right Gotta trust your people They give you compliment just a little Save you from life's riddle Seem to get you out of trouble They are nice alright Now they insist you to sacrifice You owe them your rights You think they've been wise Who owns your mind and soul? What's ever happened with no? Don't need math in friendship It's love and trust that you should keep

People hate it People love it Like darkness Sometimes it's cold Sometimes it's warm Still it's empty Longing Like a hungry child People suffer People stay the same Raise their hands All hate waiting Boring Abuse the time Betray it anyway People hate Love the same thing All at the same time What is no good Despised and needed Confused? You're not alone Know yourself more Before you run Choose your destination Love then hate Can't stand it But you keep it Be honest Jump to it

Don’t fall asleep, Nehanda! The night comes But don’t you surrender Don’t let it take over control Nehanda, open your eyes! You are the strongest when you’re awake You are the author of your life story Lead to the right direction Don’t give up the power If you close your eyes now The darkness will win It will rule your every dream It won’t be you to choose Between sweet dream or nightmare Whether you win or lose Just play the game and you’ll lose So keep your conscious mind Sing a song and dance along You gotta stay up For you life

It's comfortable enough to stay this way but this is not my way sometimes i turn left sometimes right somebody else is in control, that's not right i got to build my own life what it's gonna be like when i trust myself to live my own life what's my future gonna be like depends on how i live my life today you know what it feels like in life when you got no choice they think they know what you like but in your life, make your own choices

in this life is there such a place? where i can keep my secrets safe when i cry at night, sun doesn't need to find out in this life is there such a voice? that keeps silent though there's other choices seeks sympathy, spoils the wounded heart in this life no one can live alone but if there's no one to trust in crowd i'll be lonely things just get harder to get no word can be kept in this life can't find one yet

I don’t need to stand here in the dark Where lots of things to see Choose to be unseen I don’t have to sit here lonely A place where joy and happiness meet With closed heart, remains silent I don’t need to regret a thing For God is always in my heart Bigger than the universe I stand inside of Him The rain running down my face Is inside of Him This rain wash my sins away Standing in the rain wash my tears away Inside Him, reach the rain with these fingers I feel His love, even His smile Fall down my whole body The rain and all His blessings Because I need to stand in the light Where lots of beautiful things are there to see

I d r e a m o f s t a n d i n g i n f r o n t o f y o u V o i c e ' s n o l o n g e r a n i m a g i n a t i o n M o v e s a r e r e a l a s t h e s u n E a s i l y f i n d w h e r e t h e s o u l i s A l l o v e r t h e b e a t , a l l o v e r y o u I d r e a m o f t o u c h i n g y o u H a s G o d c r e a t e d y o u f o r r e a l ? M y h a n d s a r e f o r y o u t o h o l d F e e l m y h e a r t e n l i g h t e n e d E a c h t i m e y o u s i n g a s o n g I d r e a m o f s i n g i n g w i t h y o u D a n c e f o r m y h e a r t ' s i n j o y Y o u r e y e s s a y y o u b e l i e v e F r o m t h e d e e p e s t s o u l w e s i n g S o b e a u t i f u l t h e s o n g w i l l b e

look into my eyes, take a look inside do you see the child in me? do you see my dreams? do you see the white light? I am sacred Like a house of God You can see me laughing when things are fun You can see me crying when I'm hurt or sad But can you see me lying? No, cos I am just a child Dig into my soul, deep down inside do you see the child in me? can you find hatred? can you find war? No, you can only find peace Like a house of love Hug me and I'll hug you too Say you love me And I'll love you to the moon Can you see I'm innocent? I give unconditional love Cos I'm a child

I thought black was the only color you got But you got plenty! With your move, paint the air so colorful and real Not only a dance, You build a life-castle with true heart In the dark, You know exactly how bright the sunshine is You said it’s as bright as the light of my eyes How do you know? When I close my eyes, I can only see the darkness I need to learn from you How to see clearly with my heart as you do I thought the wind of music never blew on your side But your every move unites with every vibe Not only you dance with the music, The music becomes you, you the music In silence, You know which bird singing which song You said one of them sound as beautiful as my voice How can you tell? When I shut my ears, I can only hear the silence Allow me to learn from you How to hear clearly with my heart as you do I thought only yourself can hear the voice of your soul But I can hear you, too! How many flowers you plant inside your heart? So you can wake the butterflies up with your morning chant Without voice, You got all the melodies of all the emotions With all your senses knows which song to sing to chase the clouds away How is that possible? When I shut my mouth, don’t even know how to hum Tell me now, How to sing out loud with my free soul as you do Hear more music Sing more songs Dance with more colors Will I ever be just like you?

Seeking empathy unsympathetically Hands begging, lips cold, eyes empty Young, wandering around leaving his dignity behind Sell some poverty for small amount of pity Counting all money left in my head I don’t think so, got a bus ride to pay Keep on walking then that dire look If he only knew what my heart has given Give him love, pray to God Give him the best a man can get Out of sorrow and depression Still he wants some more Mo’ money so he can live today So mo’ bottles he can afford today Slave of his own way of living each day Beg for some money, rob some mo’ someday

Sun… Yellow! Orange! Bright!! Vivid and clear… Golden!!! It’s a dazzling gold… Hanging in the sky. Sun… Warm Healing Elevating Cheering Delighting Every hope rises up Every spirit encouraged One and all look ahead Each soul warmed All the birds sing and so are the singers All the flowers dance and so are the dancers All the tears swept away with smile Hanging in the sky is a dazzling gold For each and every living creature on earth From God with love (September 19, 2003)

I look at this man He has loved me even before I was born I am here today because of his love With his arms shelter me from the storm I love this man He gives me life and strength to survive He lives to give me happiness The best is all that I can get I look into this man’s eyes In his sadness he stands even taller Cos his love just shines even brighter He smiles, he gives me warmth This man introduced me to the Great One And this love grows higher and stronger Wherever I go, whenever I chase my dreams He prayed so I’m safe in the shelter I look at this man and look at myself I’ll make him proud just let me start No matter how far I go he’s not losing me His blessings will always keep me on the track

From now on, time won't have to wait Too long Has this heart been longing Got to find love now Too long have those souls tortured Day and night won't they stop tearing it all away These eyes just can't see Day and night they kill those dreams No regret Have they murdered their own future Of happiness, power, so-called better world No regret left when crying eyes stare Endlessly Telling them a true story of pain But those hands just won't take theirs Endlessly dancing with the fire Burning All of smiles and highest hopes Will you touch their hearts tell them to love? Burning white candles with warmest love From now on Sing out loud the song of love Everybody loves everybody

There you go down on your knees Praying for happiness you can't wait to feel Stop the rain so I can see the rainbow. Turn night into day cos I wanna see the sun You can't play some funky songs Until comes the day when you'll feel the joy How in the world can I crack a smile, when misery is all my heart can get? Can we just dance now? Choose to be happy today, not tomorrow In this life we should take things easy Do not delay, happiness is here already

to close my eyes is useless cos this heart can see to shut my ears is a dead end cos this heart can hear and this skin can feel the thorn caress or stab me, hurts anyway give me a pair of wings when both feet tied to the ground how can i even shout when mouth is shut? if i let my soul scream would i be free? would its power soar to heal the wound? roots are too deep to break, would silence make any changes? losing every priceless piece of my life can't do what i should do

this is not about wrong or right this will never be either way i only try to do good make myself feel good i give good love make the world groove never want to be a different person just be a whole person i don't want to do bad make myself feel bad i don't give any bad make the world bad always try to be a whole person not a different person this is not about wrong or right this will never be either way

(april 3, 2003) How do you fit in a box? How far would you let yourself adjust? Don’t you have your own size? The world is wide enough for your box to fit in Lotsa boxes placed side by side With different sizes all in different different colors Mo boxes put on top of the others So the boxes become higher and stronger Together, hand in hand, as one

blank paper wait to be filled wait! no need to be filled you need to fill it need to make it different wait no more blank paper rainbows of happiness clouds of sadness paint it colorful leave it colorless paint it anyway you want your imagination is your future what your hands make is what your future will be like blank paper not wait to be filled you fill it now blank paper don't care what you write you care bout what you write you care of what your life gonna be want to read it again with smile or with tears (only1aila fillin' one of her blank papers with a poem entitled 'Blank Paper')

a little lie, a bit of sweet words the highway he takes to win the game of world one day with two eyes on the back of your head one day to find out one thousand of bitter lies cold as warm black as white fire as ice one man smiles at you then one second stabs you a little lie, a bit of sweet words the highway he takes to win the game of world he's a backstabber backstabber he'll always be he's a backstabber and he'll die as one

When your heart says no But your ego keeps telling you to go Don’t look front or back Down or left or right To give your heart the strength Look up above Where God watches over you Thanks, Dad for making me look inside my heart and up above. (nehanda-aila el edroos, nov 22 ’03)

songs will remain so even if they left unsung will singers remain so if they stop singing? I've seen beautiful paintings painted by beautiful hands but if they put their brush down should I ever call them painters anymore? countless hearts rest within every human being but should i call him a man with a heart if he doesn't love?

today we just need to stop look then choose what it is in ourselves that we really want to give to someone standing in front of us today just look beyond find what it is inside deep inside we are all the same these sacred souls all belong to the highest place today notice how love has shaped every wonderful thing we feel like the one standing in front of us

Allow yourself to close your eyes and see with your heart Hold the hands of mother nature then you'll begin to hear Something that will touch your soul Brighten up your day Lift you up no matter how deep you fall Embrace the colors of the sound you hear Filling up the air, running inside your blood What it will give you is a divine power a soul healer, my music Music that comes because of my love Music that enters your broken heart and fixes it up Music that speaks from my free soul A beautiful sound of me Allow yourself to receive my love Unconditionally sharing you my joy Listen to what I want from you Listen... Can you hear what I ever want from you? No, you can't Cos I only sing the songs of giving, Joy, peace, and happiness Now listen again And Allow yourself to sing along with me

Declaration of Love I'm not a faithful lover. Currently, I have relationships with three guys All with the same amount of love One is Boy... he's tender, mature, open-minded, and handsome Two is Muchacho... he's funny, caring, attentive, and cute Three is Alok... he's powerful, loving, responsible, and good-looking I have this crazy plan... I will marry the three of them!!!! All at the same time!!! I hope they don't mind!

it is okay if you want to see from that side telling me how boastful I am how ignorant or how reluctantly I give then I will apoligize telling you how sorry I am how could I and I should be dimming away and I will be loving you anyway hold you as high in every way while letting you feel the presence of someone's trapped in your own rules of game in what you think should and shouldn't do it is okay if you want it that way then I will still be giving you as much except my true light, true joy, true self until you set me free
can you dance gracefully when you don't have positive mind?
Take all the risks you want to take, except taking the risks of being hurt by expecting more than people can give
You don't have to apologize However, apologize

Which one is more important? Your own thoughts Your dignity Your pride How right you are How wrong they are Who to blame Appear stronger Look better Speak louder Hit harder or... your heart your love your intention knowing that they are enough they are perfect they are beautiful they are unique with them you grow with them you have wonderful times
